string.name: name
string.value: Blessing of the Fairy

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants 1 skill level for every 10 levels your highest level character has. Between Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing, the higher increase is applied.

string.name: name
string.value: Empress's Blessing

string.name: h
string.value: Weapon ATT: +#x, Magic ATT: +#y, Accuracy, Avoidability: +#z

string.name: desc
string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the stronger skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Level 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Mist Eruption

string.name: desc
string.value: Can permanently increase Poison Mist damage. Upon using the skill, the nearby preset-up Poison Mists explode, dealing fatal damage to enemies. The damage will increase proportionate to the number of continuous damage effects applied to the target. You cannot detonate Mists set-up by others. The damage boost applies up to the 5th effect.\nRequired Skill: #cPoison Mist Lv. 20#

string.name: name
string.value: Glacier Chain

string.name: desc
string.value: Shoots a frigid chain forward, pulling enemies to front of you and inflicting fatal damage. Glacial Chain ignores some of the monster's DEF, freezes target, and applies damage over time.

string.name: name
string.value: Maple Warrior

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the stats of all party members. Mastery Book is required to master the skill to level 30.

string.name: pdesc

string.name: name
string.value: Final Cut

string.name: desc
string.value: Sacrifices a significant amount of HP to deal powerful damage to multiple enemies. Has a small chance of causing instant death, and some skills will gain a damage bonus for a while.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, HP Cost, +#x%, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Instant Death Chance: #z%, Damage: +#w%, Duration: #time sec, 1 sec invincibility after usage, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Sacrifices a significant amount of HP to deal powerful damage to multiple enemies. Some skills will gain a damage bonus for a while.

string.name: ph
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, HP Cost, +#x%, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Instant Death Chance: #z%, Damage: +#w%, Duration: #time sec, 1 sec invincibility after usage, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Monster Bomb

string.name: desc
string.value: Sticks an explosive charm on 1 monster to create a powerful explosion. The explosion occurs 3 seconds after the charm is activated, and anyone in range takes damage, enemy and ally alike.\n#cLv.11 or above: Mastery Book required#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage% explosion damage after #time sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Sticks an explosive charm on 1 monster to create a powerful explosion. The explosion occurs 3 seconds after the charm is activated, and anyone in range takes damage, enemy and ally alike.\n#cLv.11 or above: Mastery Book required#

string.name: ph

string.name: name
string.value: Blade Fury

string.name: desc
string.value: Spin furiously to damage nearby enemies. A portion of an enemy's defense will be ignored.\n#cMastery Book required to unlock Lv.11#

string.name: h

string.value: Spin furiously to damage nearby enemies.\n#cLv.11 or above: Mastery Book required#

string.name: ph
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: name
string.value: Chains of Hell

string.name: desc
string.value: When you have Dark Sight active, Chains of Hell pulls an enemy close to deal damage by attacking up to 10 times with an increased Critical Hit Rate. However, stationary monsters have to be in range. \n#cLv.11 or above: Mastery Book required#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Number of Attacks: #attackCount,Damage: #damage%, Critical Hit Rate: +#cr%

string.name: name
string.value: Mirrored Target

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases your Defense and Avoidability. Also turns your Mirror Image into a dummy that draws enemy attacks and absorbs damage. This skill can only be used when Mirror Image is active.\nRequired Skill: #cLv. 20 Mirror Image#\n#cMastery Book required to unlock Lv. 11#

string.name: h
string.value: Active Effects - MP Cost: #mpCon, Dummy HP: +#x, Dummy Duration: #time seconds, Damage Absorbed: +#y%\nPassive Effects - Dodge Chance: #er%, Weapon DEF: +#pddR%, Magic DEF: +#mddR%

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Permanently increases your Defense and Avoidability. Also turns your Mirror Image into a dummy that draws enemy attacks and absorbs damage. This skill can only be used when Mirror Image is active.\nRequired Skill: #cLv. 20 Mirror Image#\n#cMastery Book required to unlock Lv. 11# (String)

string.name: ph
string.value: Active Effects - MP Cost: #mpCon, Dummy HP: +#x, Dummy Duration: #time seconds, Damage Absorbed: +#y%\nPassive Effects - Dodge Chance: #er%, Weapon DEF: +#pddR%, Magic DEF: +#mddR%

string.name: hch
string.value: Active Effects - MP Cost: #mpCon, Dummy HP:#hcSummonHp, Dummy Duration: #time seconds, Damage Absorbed: +#y%\nPassive Effects - Dodge Chance: #er%, Weapon DEF: +#pddR%, Magic DEF: +#mddR%

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases your ATT for a fixed period of time and allows you to resist knock-back effects when struck.\n#cLv. 11 or above: Mastery Book required#

string.value: Monkey Wave

string.name: name
string.value: Horntail's Flame Breath

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls up Horntail's soul to bathe the enemies around you in flames. Targeted enemies will receive continual flame damage over time.

string.name: h1
string.value: Strikes 15 enemies for 3000% damage. Critical Probability +20%, continual damage every second for 10 seconds, 10 minute cooldown.

string.value: Rex's Charge

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls up Rex's soul to instantly annihilate enemies in front of you. Does normal damage to boss monsters.

string.name: h1
string.value: Instantly eliminates to normal monsters, does 900% damage to boss monsters. 10 minute cooldown.

string.value: Ani's Judgment

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls up Ani's soul to crush enemies with a powerful hammer that ignores enemy defense.

string.name: h1
string.value: Strikes 1 enemy for 4000% damage. Critical Probability +40%, ignores enemy defense, 10 minute cooldown.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Rider's Energy Breath

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls up the Dragon Rider's soul to blast enemies in front of you with a powerful Energy Charge. Targeted enemies will receive continual damage over time.

string.name: h1
string.value: Strikes 15 enemies for 2000% damage. Critical Probability +40%, 300% continual damage for 10 seconds, 10 minute cooldown.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls up Von Leon's soul to inflict a devastating strike on an enemy.

string.name: h1
string.value: Strikes 1 enemy for 5000% damage. Critical Probability +30%, ignores enemy defense, 10 minute cooldown.

string.name: name
string.value: Zakum's Towering Inferno

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls up Zakum's soul to burn enemies around you with towering flames. Targeted enemies will receive continual fire damage over time.

string.name: h1
string.value: Strikes 15 enemies for 3000% damage. Critical Probability +20%, continual damage every second for 10 seconds, 10 minute cooldown.

string.value: Spirit of Rock's Doom Strike

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the Spirit of Rock's soul for 2 minutes, stunning nearby enemies.

string.name: h1
string.value: Performs a stun attack on 15 enemies for 500% damage. 2 minute duration, 15 minute cooldown.

string.name: desc

Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the stronger skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Level 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Unicorn Spike

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a sacred unicorn that attacks multiple enemies ahead of you while weakening them for a fixed period of time. Weakened enemies take additional damage from a fixed number of attacks from your party members. For boss monsters, the amount of additional damage is doubled.

string.name: name
string.value: Water Shield

string.name: desc
string.value: Borrows the power of the spirits to raise a water barrier around you for a fixed period of time. The barrier absorbs a portion of the damage you receive, and increases resistance against abnormal status and all elemental attacks.

string.name: name
string.value: Elemental Knights

string.name: desc
string.value:
Randomly summons an Ice Spirit, Fire Spirit, or Shadow Spirit to aid you in battle.
Ice Spirit: Has a chance to freeze enemies.
Fire Spirit: Deals continuous fire damage to enemies.
Shadow Spirit: Deals increased damage.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, 1 random Spirit summoned for #time sec.
Ice Spirit - Damage: #damage%, Freeze Chance: #prop%, Freeze Duration: #subTime sec
Fire Spirit - Damage Over Time: #v% chance of causing +#y% damage every +#x sec for #w sec
Shadow Spirit: Damage: #z%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.value: Freezing Axe

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Strikes many enemies in front of you. \n[Command: #cAttack Key]

string.name: ph
string.value: Attacks a maximum of #mobCount enemies, inflicting #damage% damage.

string.name: name
string.value: Ice Smash

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Transforms your axe into a huge sword to attack many enemies in front of you, freezing them for a certain duration. #cThis skill can only be used when there are more than 20 Ice Gauge#. \n[Command: #c ↑↑+ Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Consumes #iceGageCon Ice Gauge to attack a maximum of #mobCount enemies, inflicting #damage% damage. Freezes for #time seconds at a rate of #prop%.

string.name: name
string.value: Ice Tempest

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Transforms your axe into a huge sword to attack many enemies in front of you, freezing them for a certain duration. #cThis skill can only be used when there are more than 40 Ice Gauge#. \n[Command: #c ↑↑+ Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Consumes #iceGageCon Ice Gauge to attack a maximum of #mobCount enemies, inflicting #damage% damage. Inflicts #dot% damage as DOT (damage over time) for #dotTime.

string.name: name
string.value: Ice Chop

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Slash your axe to attack many enemies in front of you, making them pass out with a certain rate. #cThis skill can only be used when there are more than 5 Ice Gauge#s. \n[Command: #c ↓ + Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Consumes #iceGageCon Ice Gauge to attack a maximum of #mobCount enemies, inflicting #damage% damage. This skill makes enemies pass out for #time seconds at a #prop% rate.

string.name: name
string.value: Ice Curse

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Cast a very strong curse that transforms all challengers in the world into lowly snails. #cThis skill can only be used when there are more than 160 Ice Gauge#s. \n[Command: #c ↓↑ + Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Consumes #iceGageCon Ice Gauge, and transforms all challengers into Ice Snails for #time seconds at a #prop% rate.

string.value: Useful Combat Orders

Depending on the #cfinal skill of each job, it can be increased above the master level#, and other skills can be increased up to the master level. The beginner skill, combat orders, and useful combat orders' skill level cannot be increased.

string.value: Infernal Concussion

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls an eruption from below to blast nearby enemies into the air. Enemies in air receive 100% critical damage from the explosion.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Fury Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount. Lifts enemies into the air and deals #w critical attacks that deal #v% damage.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Calls an eruption from below to blast nearby enemies into the air. Enemies in air receive 100% critical damage from the explosion.

string.name: ph
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Fury Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Has a #prop% chance to launch enemies into the air to perform #w critical attacks that deal #v% damage.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: hch
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Fury Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount. Lifts enemies into the air to deal #w critical attacks that deal #v% damage.\nCooldown: #hcCooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Demon Impact

string.name: desc
string.value: Call forth your inner demon to deal critical damage on multiple enemies in front of you. Your channel to the nether gives you a chance to ignore Enemy DEF and raises your chance for a critical. Final damage increases when fighting boss monsters.

string.name: h
string.value: Fury Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Additional Critical Rate: #cr%, Enemy Defense Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Final Damage against Boss Monster: +#bdR%

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Call forth your inner demon to deal critical damage on multiple enemies in front of you. Your channel to the nether gives you a chance to ignore Enemy DEF and raises your chance for a critical. Final damage increases when fighting boss monsters.

string.name: ph
string.value: Fury Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Additional Critical Rate: #cr%, Enemy Defense Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Final Damage against Boss Monster: +#bdR%

string.name: name
string.value: Leech Aura

string.name: desc
string.value: Utilize your connection with the crawling slimy things of the world to sap enemy HP with every blow. You and your party members will receive life for every blow you inflict for a short time, up to 3% at a time.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #forceCon Force, restoring +#x% of damage from attacks as HP for party members for #time seconds. This skill cannot restore more than 50% of maximum HP, and HP cannot be reabsorbed for 15 seconds after an absorption.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Utilize your connection with the crawling slimy things of the world to sap enemy HP with every blow. You and your party members will receive life for every blow you inflict for a short time, up to 3% at a time.

string.name: ph
string.value: Fury Cost: #forceCon, +#x% of damage returned to party members as HP for #time sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Demon Cry

string.name: desc
string.value: Releases your inner demons to intimidate and deal damage on multiple nearby enemies. Enemies will suffer a hit to DEF, ATT, and Accuracy while your EXP and item drop rate increase.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Fury Cost: #forceCon, Attack Count: #attackCount, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount. For #subTime sec, Enemy Attack and Defense -+#x%, Accuracy -+#x%. EXP and item drop rate: +#w%.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Releases your inner demons to intimidate and deal damage on multiple nearby enemies. Enemies will suffer a hit to DEF, ATT, and Accuracy while your EXP and item drop rate increase.

string.name: ph
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Fury Cost: #forceCon, Attack Count: #attackCount, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount. For #subTime sec, Enemy Attack and Defense: -+#x%, Accuracy -+#x%. EXP and Item Drop Rate: +#w%.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: hch
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Fury Cost: #forceCon, Attack Count: #attackCount, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount. For #subTime sec, Enemy Attack and Defense: -+#x%, Accuracy -+#x%. EXP and Item Drop Rate: +#w%.\nCooldown: #hcCooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Maple Warrior

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the stats of all party members. Mastery Book is required to master the skill to level 30.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, All Stats: +#x%, Duration: #time sec

string.name: name
string.value: Dark Metamorphosis

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleashes 2 beings of spectral shadow to join you and attack anything in sight. The spirit channel also provides you and increase to damage and HP for a short period of time.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #hpCon HP, Force #forceCon, damage #damR% for #time seconds, increases Max HP #indieMhpR% increase, automatic attack on surrounding enemies, inflicting #damage% damage \nCooldown Time: #cooltime seconds

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Unleashes 2 beings of spectral shadow to join you and attack anything in sight. The spirit channel also provides you and increase to damage and HP for a short period of time.

string.name: ph
string.value: Consumes #hpCon HP, Force #forceCon, damage #damR% for #time seconds, increases Max HP #indieMhpR% increase, automatic attack on surrounding enemies, inflicting #damage% damage \nCooldown Time: #cooltime seconds

string.name: name
string.value: Binding Darkness

string.name: desc
string.value: Has a chance to knock down multiple enemies and deal continuous damage while they are on the ground. The attack also ignores a fixed amount of enemy DEF. The effects of Dark Bind apply to both bosses and regular monsters.

string.name: h
string.value: Active Effects - Fury Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage Over Time: #prop% chance of causing #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #time sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec\nPassive Effects - Enemy DEF permanently ignored by #ignoreMobpdpR%

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Has a chance to knock down multiple enemies and deal continuous damage while they are on the ground. The attack also ignores a fixed amount of enemy DEF. The effects of Dark Bind apply to both bosses and regular monsters.

string.name: ph
string.value: Active Effects - Fury Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage Over Time: #prop% chance of causing #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #time sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec\nPassive Effects - Enemy DEF permanently ignored by #ignoreMobpdpR%

string.name: hch
string.value: Active Effects - Fury Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage Over Time: #prop% chance of causing #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #hcTime sec, Knock-Down Chance: #hcProp%, Knock-Down Duration: #hcSubTime sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec\nPassive Effects - Enemy DEF permanently ignored by #ignoreMobpdpR%

string.name: name
string.value: Boundless Rage

string.name: desc
string.value: Consumes all remaining Fury to send yourself into a raging berserker mode. All Fury-based attacks will be free for a short period, however the skill has a long cooldown.

string.name: h
string.value: Fury Cost: #forceCon, Use skills without consuming Fury, Duration: #time sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Defeat enemies and steal their spirits with the power of the netherworld.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #hpCon HP to attack #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, inflicting #damage% damage. Increases Boss ATT by #bdR%, ignores Enemy Defense by #ignoreMobpdpR%. Adds an absorption of force effect upon attacking by +#x. \nCooldown Time: #cooltime seconds

string.name: name
string.value: Will of Liberty

string.name: desc
string.value: Draw power and inspiration from the resistance's dream of a free and liberated Maple World.

string.name: h
string.value: Fury Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage: +#indieDamR%, Max Damage: +#indieMaxDamageOver\nCooldown: #cooltime sec. Applies to any Resistance characters within the party

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Blood

string.name: desc
string.value: Awakens the power inherent in those with a noble lineage.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #hpCon HP and #forceCon Force. Adds +#x% hits for all attacks for #time seconds. \nCooldown Time: #cooltime seconds \nPassive Effect: increases Maximum Damage by #MDamageOver, and reduces Force Consumption for all skills by #reduceForceR%.

string.name: name
string.value: Solid Wall

string.name: desc
string.value: Greatly increases Physical and Magic DEF through sheer strength of will.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently increases Physical DEF by #pddR% and Magic DEF by #mddR%.

string.name: name
string.value: Desperado Mastery

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases Desperado's Mastery and Accuracy.

string.value: Inner Strength

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: Exceed: Demon Strike

string.name: desc
string.value: Charges forward to slash enemies with great force. \r\n#cExceed#: Attack Speed increases as time passes, but this also increases HP consumption. The charging range increases for the final strike.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #hpRCon% Max HP to attack a maximum of #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, inflicting #damage% damage.

string.name: name
string.value: Bat Swarm

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a swarm of bats that position themselves in front of you. Pressing the Skill Key can change the bats' direction.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #hpCon HP to attack #attackCount times, inflicting #damage% damage. \n#cThe skill is cancelled after a number of attacks, moving a certain distance, or a certain amount of time. Pressing the Skill Key once more will change the direction of the bats.#

string.value: Exceed: Moonlight Slash

string.name: name

string.name: name
string.value: Shield Charge

string.name: desc
string.value: Charge forward with a shield to push away enemies in front of you. After charging into them, the power from the shield pushes away more enemies, making them pass out.

string.value: Consumes #hpCon HP to attack a maximum of #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, inflicting #damage% damage. \r\nAfter the initial charging attack, the shield attacks #z enemies, inflicting +#x% damage, pushing them away more.

string.value: Reflect Evil

string.name: desc
string.value:
Activates <Missile Tank> mode during which your meach continuously consumes MP to gain an increased Critical Hit Rate. You can use Seige Mode during Missile Tank mode for increased damage. 
Get on/off your mount by pressing the skill key. 
[To shoot: [#cAttack key#]
[Skills that can be used: #cLaser Blast, Siege Mode#]
Required Skill: #cMech: Siege Mode Lv. 10#

string.value: Installs a robot factory that summons toy robots. Summoned robots detect nearby enemies and triggers a self-destruct function. The factory itself also self-destructs after a certain period of time.

string.name: ph
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Robot Factory Duration: #time sec, Max Toy Robots Summoned: +#y toy robots, Toy Robot Damage: #u%, Summon Interval: every +#x sec, Self-Destruct Damage: #selfDestruction%\n#cCooldown: #cooltime seconds.#

string.name: name
string.value: Amplifier Robot AF-11

string.name: desc
string.value: The stationary amplifier robot <AF-11> is summoned to enhance the damage of all party members. AF-11 self-destructs when it runs out of power.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Robot Duration: #time sec, Damage Buff: +#x%, Self-Destruct Damage: #selfDestruction%, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: The stationary amplifier robot AF-11 enhances the damage of all nearby team members. AF-11 self-destructs when it runs out of power.

string.name: ph
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Robot Duration: #time sec, Damage Buff: +#x%, Self-Destruct Damage: #selfDestruction% \n#cCooldown: #cooltime seconds#

string.name: name
string.value: Laser Blast

string.name: desc
string.value: Shoots a laser beam that attacks multiple enemies. This skill can only be used during a Missile Tank mode.\nRequired Skill: #cMech: Missile Tank Lv. 1#

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Shoots a laser beam that attacks multiple enemies. This skill can only be used during a Missile Tank mode.\nRequired Skill: #cMech: Missile Tank Lv. 1#

string.name: name
string.value: Mech: Siege Mode

string.name: desc
string.value: Your Mech switches to <Siege> mode to optimize firepower. Only basic attacks can be used during Siege mode. Increase the Critical Hit Rate of all attack. When attacked, you will gain a Stance effect.\n[To Attack: #cAttack key#]

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Siege Mode Duration: #time seconds, Damage: #damage%\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Your Mech switches to Siege mode to optimize firepower. Only basic attacks can be used during Siege mode. Increase the Critical Hit Rate of all attacks.\n[To Attack: #cAttack key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Siege Mode Duration: #time seconds, Damage: #damage%\n#cCooldown: #cooltime seconds# sec

string.name: name
string.value: Distortion Field

string.name: desc
string.value: Distorts space by shooting special bullets made with Resistance vision technology.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP, repeatedly attacking #mobCount enemies, inflicting #damage% damage for #time seconds. \nCooldown Time: #cooltime seconds

string.name: name
string.value: Will of Liberty

string.name: desc
string.value: Draw power and inspiration from the resistance's dream of a free and liberated Maple World.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP, inflicing #indieDamR% for #time seconds. Increases Maximum Damage by #indieMaxDamageOver. \nCooldown Time: #cooltime seconds /nThis skill is only effective on Resistance members in your Party.

string.name: name
string.value: Reactive Metal Armor

string.name: desc
string.value: Activates special reaction gloves that fortify metal armor.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP, increasing Max HP by #indieMhpR% for #time seconds. Increases Abnormal Status Resistance by +#x%, and reduces damage from enemies by +#y%.

string.name: name
string.value: Redial Nerve Refine

string.name: desc
string.value: Enhances the lumbar nerves, increasing all stats related to movement.

string.name: h
string.value: Increases Accuracy by #accR%, Speed by #psdSpeed, Maximum Speed by #speedMax, and Jump by #psdJump.

string.name: name
string.value: Multilateral II

string.name: desc
string.value: Achieving a certain level of invested AP will grant specific bonuses for each ability.

string.name: h
string.value:
More than +#x STR: More than Stance +#y%
 +#x DEX: More than all Elemental Resistances & Abnormal Status Resistance #z%
 +#x LUK: More than Avoidability #u%
 +#x LUK/STR/DEX: Total damage #w%.

string.name: name
string.value: Energy Spline

string.name: desc
string.value: Slash an Energy Sword twice to inflict major damage.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to attack #mobCount enemies in front of you a maximum of #attackCount times, inflicting #damage% damage.

string.name: name
string.value: Sudden Propel

string.name: desc
string.value: Suddenly heats up and runs outside in front of you.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP. Jumps one more time to the front while jumping. This can be used twice in a row.

string.name: name
string.value: Incline Power

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases power and resulting damage.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Supply]#\n Consumes #powerCon energy to increase ATT by #indiePad for #time seconds. \n[Passive Effect]: increases all abilities by #strX.

string.name: name
string.value: Pinpoint Rocket

string.name: desc
string.value: Shoots numerous missiles at enemies within range. Consumes Surplus Energy and can be used during flight.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Supply]#\nConsumes #powerCon energy to shoot #bulletCount missiles, inflicting #damage% damage to enemies within a certain range.

string.name: name
string.value: Minority Support

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases all abilities.

string.name: h
string.value: Increases all abilities by #strX.

string.value: Xenon Mastery

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Mastery and Physical ATT.

string.name: h

string.name: desc

string.name: h
string.value:
More than +#x STR: More than Stance +#y%
 +#x DEX: More than all Elemental Resistances & Abnormal Status Resistance #z%

string.name: h

string.name: name
string.value: Quicksilver Sword: Flash

string.name: desc
string.value: Slash many enemies in front of you with an Energy Sword. Mode can be changed with the Multi mode linker.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to attack a maximum of #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, inflicting #damage% damage.

string.name: name
string.value: Ion thruster

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses the charged Surplus Energy to summon an Ion Thruster while inflicting damage to enemies in front of you. Pressing the Skill Key continuously pushes them away.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Supply]#\nConsumes #powerCon energy and #mpCon MP to push away a maximum of #mobCount enemies, inflicting #damage% damage. Lasts for #time seconds. Energy is only consumed when summoning the Ion Thruster.

string.name: name
string.value: Linear Perspective

string.name: desc
string.value: Activates vision that identifies enemy weaknesses for a certain amount of time, increasing Critical Rate. Consumes Surplus Energy.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Supply]#\n Consumes #powerCon energy to increase Critical Rate increases for #time seconds\n[Passive Effect]: increases all abilities by #strX.

string.name: name
string.value: Efficiency Pipeline

string.name: desc
string.value: Efficiently maintains energy flow for a certain amount of time and increases Max HP and MP. Passive effect increases Max HP and Max MP.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to increase Max HP and MP by #indieMhpR% for #time seconds.\n[Passive Effect]: increases Max HP and MP by #mhpX.

string.name: name
string.value: Xenon Booster

string.name: desc
string.value: Consume MP and increases Attack Speed by 2 levels for a certain amount of time. \n[Required Skill]: #cAbove Xenon Mastery Lv. 5#

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to enhance Attack Speed for #time seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Quicksilver Sword: Focus

string.name: desc
string.value: Thrust an Energy Sword straight ahead to inflict fatal damage on enemies. This attack has a higher Accuracy and Critical Rate than normal. Mode can be changed through Multi Moder Link.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to attack a maximum of #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, inflicting #damage% damage. Increases Accuracy by +#y and Critical Rate by +#x% for this skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Quicksilver Sword: Leap

string.name: desc
string.value: Quickly swing an Energy Sword as you leap and activate a Booster. Mode can be changed through the Multi Mode Liker.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to attack a maximum of #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, inflicting #damage% damage. This skill can be used with Ion Thruster.

string.name: name
string.value: Aegis System

string.name: desc
string.value: Shoots missile at enemies that have attacked you with a certain percentage upon getting attacked/avoiding an attack. Fired missiles disregard reflexes and cause damage.

string.name: h
string.value: Shoots +#x missiles that cause damage to enemies that attacked you at a rate of #prop% upon getting attacked/avoiding attacks.

string.name: name
string.value: Triangle Formation

string.name: desc
string.value: Launches an air frame at enemies upon attacking at a certain range. Air frame attracts the enemy's attention and reduces enemy Accuracy and Avoidability. Attacking enemies with 3 overlapping air frames will cause the 3 air frames to attack them.

string.name: h
string.value: Summons an air frame at an enemy upon attacking at a rate of #prop%. A maximum number of air frames can be overlapped, and attacking enemies with 3 overlapping air frames will cause them to attack with #damage% damage. Decreases Accuracy and Avoidability of enemies by +#x% for each overlapping air frame.

string.name: name
string.value: Multilateral IV

string.name: desc
string.value: Achieving a certain level of invested AP will grant specific bonuses for each ability. \n[Required Skill]: #c Above Multilateral II#

string.name: h
string.value:
More than +#x STR: More than Stance +#y%
 +#x DEX: More than all Elemental Resistances & Abnormal Status Resistance #z%

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to attack a maximum of #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, inflicting #damage% damage.

string.name: name
string.value: Diagonal Chase

string.name: desc
string.value: Use an Air Booster to push away enemies while soaring upward. This skill can be used with Fila Scramble.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to knock back and inflict #damage% damage to #mobCount enemies.

string.name: name
string.value: Fila Scramble

string.name: desc
string.value: Levitate enemies with an anti-gravity Energy Field. Enemies are that are farther away will float higher, and the Energy field slows down falling.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to levitate enemies, hitting them with #attackCount attacks to inflict #damage% damage on a maximum of #mobCount enemies.

string.name: name
string.value: Dual Breed Defensive

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Avoidability by 100%. This bonus Avoidability and received damage is then reduced after every attack/avoided attack. Permanently increases Defense. \n[Required Skill]: #cAbove Linear Perspective Lv. 5#

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Supply]#\nConsumes #powerCon energy to increase Avoidability by #prop%. This bonus Avoidability then decreases by +#y% for every attack avoided. Received damage decreases by #z%. This buff is cancelled after avoiding +#x attacks. \n[Passive Effect]: increases all abilities by #strX and Physical and Magic DEF by #pddX.

string.name: name
string.value: Virtual Projection

string.name: desc
string.value: Project your own reflection as an animated phantom. This phantom damages the enemy at a certain rate related to the damage you inflict. After receiving an amount of damage equivalent to your HP, the phantom vanishes. Phantoms cannot copy Pinpoint Rocket and Aegis System, which shoots out missiles directly.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to creates a Phantom that acts as you do. Phantom inflicts +#y% damage when it attacks. Phantom vanishes after receiving damage equal to +#x00% of Max HP.

string.value: Extra Supply

string.name: name
string.value: Combat Switching: Shoot down

string.name: h

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP to attack a maximum of #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, inflicting #damage% damage.

string.value: Hologram Graffitti: Cut Through

string.value: Opatz Code

string.name: name
string.value: Time Capsule

string.name: desc

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP. Reduces Cooldown Time for nearby party members for #time seconds. Cooldown Time: #cooltime seconds

When party members in the field avoid attacks, this charges 1 Surplus Energy. #wCooldown Time: #cooltime seconds)

string.name: name
string.value: Confining Entanglement

string.value: Undoes all Buffs by slashing an Energy Sword at many enemies in front of you to bind them. Bound enemies cannot do anything for a while. Shares resistance with Smite.
